summary: This mod adds a spell which makes you scream and unleash your power out, surround you with flames, restore your health, and makes you immortal for 1minute.
descriptionHtml:
I've felt bad after defeating Alduin and all I  get is a useless shout, so I made this spell, it makes you scream like battle cry (only scream tho) then surrounds you with fire just like flame cloak (100 damage per second) restores your health (1.000) and keeps your incoming damage rate to 0 for 1 minute.

Description : After defeating the world's eater. The nine divines bless you with the power of half immortality as a reward of saving the world. A power that rivals the Daedra princes. You can activate the blessing  to restore your health, be surrounded by  flames, and become immortal for a short period of time.


To get the spell simply open Console by pressing `   (The button above tab)

type  Help immortality

It will give you Half Immortality's ID number

Type Player.additem ID       <--- the ID is the number it gives you when you type help immortality
author: Ace
